metadata.name: The African Beauty #1
metadata.description: **The African Beauty Grand** is Ethereum version of [**The African Beauty By Kaowpod**](https://opensea.io/collection/the-african-beauty-v2) NFTs project on Polygon Blockchain, It has been created to promote the beauty of a woman and opens up doors for all genders, races, ethnicities, socioeconomic statuses, ages, religions, and sexual orientations. This project will present how ‘Black is Beautiful’ through their self-worth and the way they represent themselves. The artists show the African charm by presenting their dresses that are made of materials originating from gemstone & gold mines in Africa. The lipstick shades from the world most famous’s brand names are chosen to paint and empower the true beauty of those women. **The African Beauty Grand** has 10,000 NFTs in total with 5 characteristics of the beauty: **1. Aruno Ada**, the eldest daughter of the Adas family from Egypt, is a representative of Northern Africa. **2. Zuri Abdi** from Kenya is a representative of Eastern Africa. **3. Amara Eze**, the beauty of faith is a representative of Nigeria, Western Africa, **4. Emmalee Moseki**, a very determined girl from Botswana represents Southern Africa, and **5. Isabel Ango**, the beautiful angel of Angola represents central Africa. All of the NFTs are unique and live on the blockchain, among them have limited rare items which can be found in the design of **99 earrings** and the color of **299 lipstick shades**. The most **super rare** items are hidden in the 5 **eye colors** of the African woman you would fall in love with and be lucky to be found. **ROAD MAP:** *May 2022--Launch of The African Beauty project.*  **December 2022**--Launch The Asian Beauty NFTs project. **April 2023**--Launch of The European Beauty NFTs project. **January 2024**--Grand opening of The World Beauty Metaverse. ALL holding accounts of the related projects will be listed on the presale white lists of every new project. The details will be officially announced on the project's social media accounts: [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/theafricanbeautynfts), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/theafribeauty) before the launching date of each project. To collect **The African Beauty Grand** [CLICK](https://opensea.io/collection/the-african-beauty-v2-1) or collect **The African Beauty by kaowpod** on Polygon Blockchain [CLICK](https://opensea.io/collection/the-african-beauty-v2) or visit related project **The Happy Frog Prince** [CLICK](https://opensea.io/collection/happy-frog-prince)
